tp.pr4.logic

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr4.logic.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadOnlyBoard

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReadOnlyBoard
    Stores the information about the board. The size is fixed at the moment of construction. It contains methods to access the information of each cell and to place counters.
    Since:
    Assignment 1.

     int ty)

      • getPosition

        public Counter getPosition(int x,
                  int y)
        Description copied from interface: ReadOnlyBoard
        Accessor method which returns the state of a particular position on the board (i.e. the value of the counter at that position).
        Specified by:
        getPosition in interface ReadOnlyBoard
        Parameters:
        x - Column number (1..width)
        y - Row number (1..height)
        Returns:
        State of the position on the board. If the position is invalid, returns Counter.EMPTY

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(int x,
               int y,
               Counter colour)
        Mutator method to place a counter at a particular position on the board. Can also be used to remove a counter from the position provided (by writing it to Counter.EMPTY).
        Parameters:
        x - Column number (1..width)
        y - Row number (1..height)
        colour - Colour of the counter. A value is Counter.EMPTY is used to indicate leaving the position without a counter.
